g.text: Web Client SignIn and SignUp with Service Provider
Request user info with access token
Verify that the email is a new account and
if email is not new account need to
[Email is not new account and is not previous bound provider]
Alert warning message in register form
[Email is not new account (this mean is sign In)]
Redirect to Home page root path /
[Email is a new account (this mean is sign Up)]
Insert new user into the database and link account provider
Response user info and assign to
Enter user credentials missing in form
Update user info into the database
Redirect to Home page root path /
